attributes.action: Repeal the Human Rights Law in UK
attributes.additional_details: I would request the House of Commons to debate the possibility of repealling every part of the Human Rights Laws that were introduced into this Country by the last Labour Government. These laws have, from day one, been a charter for the criminal, the work-shy, and the illegal immigrant. The law does nothing for the hardworking and decent british people and should be removed forthwith.
